00034  // Some of this code may have elements taken from other code without attribution.
00035  // If this is the case it was due to oversight while debugging and I apologize.
00036  // If anyone has any reason to believe that any of this code violates other licenses
00037  // please contact me with details so that I may correct the situation. 
00038  
00039 #define RING_PEEK_C
00040 
00041 #include <stdint.h>
00042 #include <stdlib.h>
00043 #include "ring.h"
00044 
00045 uint8_t ring_peek(ring_t *r, uint8_t *buf, uint8_t count)
00046 {
00047     ring_index_t index;
00048     uint8_t total = 0;
00049 
00050     if (r != NULL && buf != NULL)
00051     {
00052         index = r->tail_index;
00053         // Compare the head index to the tail index
00054         while(count && index != r->head_index)
00055         {
00056             *buf++ = r->buffer[index++];    // Grab data requested and increment
00057     
00058             if(index >= r->size)        // End of buffer determination
00059             {
00060                 index = 0;
00061             }
00062     
00063             count--;
00064             total++;
00065         }
00066     }
00067     return(total);
00068 }
